name: NSEvent.PointingDeviceType
desc: The pointing-device types for tablet-proximity events or mouse events with a proximity event subtype.

items.name: case eraser
items.desc: Represents the eraser end of a stylus-like pointing device.

items.name: case pen
items.desc: Represents the tip end of a stylus-like pointing device.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: Represents an unknown type of pointing device.
